sentences.en: a fractional hesitation before he said yes
sentences.cn: 他说“是”之前的略微犹豫

sentences.en: Extensive research has shown that fractional atomic masses always mean mixture of isotopes.
sentences.cn: 进一步的研究揭示出:部分原子质量常是同位素的混合物.

sentences.en: He had both fractional interests and majority interests.
sentences.cn: 他兼有零星的股权和大宗股权.

sentences.en: In this case the fractional part is discarded.
sentences.cn: 在此情况下小数部分被丢掉了.

sentences.en: It can be separated from each other by ordinary fractional distillation.
sentences.cn: 两者通过普通的分馏彼此分离.

sentences.en: Moreover, the corresponding results of the multilinear fractional maximal operator are obtained.
sentences.cn: 进一步得到多线性分数次极大算子的相应结果.

sentences.en: Remember the fractional number clearly . No mistake can be allowed.
sentences.cn: 一定要记清楚奇零,这个数目可千万不要错.

sentences.en: Rounds a decimal value to a specified number of fractional digits.
sentences.cn: 将小数值按指定的小数位数舍入.

sentences.en: Rounds a double - precision floating - point value to the specified number of fractional digits.
sentences.cn: 将双 精度浮 点值按指定的小数位数舍入.

sentences.en: The difference between her wages and yours is only fractional.
sentences.cn: 她的薪水和你的只差一点点.

sentences.en: The integer data type is toa numeric value without a fractional component.
sentences.cn: 所有数值数据类型都是从小数数据类型里派生出来的.

sentences.en: The main diagenesis is fractional crystallization assimilation and contamination.
sentences.cn: 成岩作用是分离结晶和同化混染联合作用.

sentences.en: The profit on the deal was fractional.
To examinee, the place is more valuable than fractional absolute value.
sentences.cn: 对于考生而言, 名次比分数绝对值更有价值.

sentences.en: Using the Page Style dialog - can specify margins to two ( fractional ) decimal places.
sentences.cn: 使用页面样式对话框,指定页 边距,准确到小数点后两位.
